title: Modern Classic!  Top Floor, 2 Bedroom @ the corner of Alamo Sq Park !
posting_body: Located at the corner of Alamo Square Park, this two bedroom is available for immediate occupancy.
This is a top floor unit has a great feel with natural light and two park views!
It's also located on a corner with no shared walls.
There are two spacious bedrooms separated by a large formal foyer.

Updated kitchen and baths and walking distance to the Heart of NOPA and the Divisadero Corridors where you will find charming boutiques, coffee shops and local restaurants: NOPA, Nopalito, Bar Crudo, Little Star Pizza and so much more.
Bi-Rite and Falletti's is just blocks away and many bus lines to pick from taking you to all different parts of the city!
Lots of natural light and hardwood floors and/or new carpet (2022) throughout
- Recently remodeled, top floor, corner unit
- Eat-in kitchen w/ new stainless fridge and gas range
- Hardwood floors and new carpeting throughout
- On the SW corner of Alamo Sq Park
- Tons of food and drink on Divisadero St and near Lower Haight
- Easy transportation to the 21 Hayes Bus and near N Judah line in Duboce Park
- Local coffee shops in walking distance
- Close to neighborhood shops and conveniences
- Move-in cost due at lease signing: first month's rent + security deposit.
- Verifiable income = or greater than 3x the rent
Rental listings subject to change at any time.
